summary: Feature request to enable graceful worker shutdown based on operating system signals (SIGTERM, SIGINT). This would allow the Ruby SDK to properly handle termination signals and cleanly shut down workers.
userImpact: Users need a way to gracefully shut down workers in response to OS signals, which is essential for containerized deployments and proper process management.
resolutionDetails: Worker signal handling was implemented to support graceful shutdown based on OS signals.
